amendment.description: Amendment prevents State and local governments who refuse to share information with Federal immigration authorities from obtaining Federal funds under this bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds to be used in contravention of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 189 (Roll no. 485).
